origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'DeFiAPI.get_reports', 'description': 'This function retrieves DeFi analysis reports based on the topic and duration specified.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'topic', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The topic of the reports, e.g., Uniswap, Aave.'}, {'name': 'duration', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The duration for which reports are needed, e.g., 1 week, 1 month.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reports', 'description': 'The list of DeFi analysis reports.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 DeFiAPI.get_reports, 它的参数输入如下: 'topic'是'Uniswap', 'duration'是'1 week'.
